name: The Scorpion King: Sword of Osiris
description:
A platform adventure based on the world and characters of the movie The Scorpion King. Mathayus (The Scorpion King) must rescue his wife, Cassandra, from the hands of the evil warlord Menthu, who whishes to use Cassandra's magical abilites for his own evil purpose.

Using a Gauntlet, Mathayus can increase his attacking speed and power by feeding it magic gems, collected by defeating boss characters in 6 different worlds, with traps and enemy characters littering each level.

releases.country: France, Germany, Italy, Spain, United Kingdom

shot.caption: Title screen and main menu.
To continue your current journey, insert your password here.
Cassandra goes to the rescue!
Snakes and some royalty guards: some of the first enemies who you'll find. But they are very weak!
Going up in a rope.
The first shock with Menthu.
He will attack of diverse forms: in the first one (making this very quaint pose), energy balls will cross the screen in both sides. Jump them and you'll be safe.
And the second attack form is a... "Kame Hame Ha"?!?...  ;-(
The place is crowded of mystical artifacts. What a trash!
Test your accuracy with mummy slicing!
This royalty guard wasn't sufficiently strong to resist the two scythes combined power...
You received your first item! It seems a certain "Titan's Mitt"... ;-)
Pause the game to access this screen, where the main items will be stored later in the adventure.
Join 100 little scorpions like these and earn 1-UP, as well as the coins in Mario games.
Dark rooms can reserve many surprises. Or perhaps not!
Calm! It isn't snowing in the desert: it's a sand storm in action. It diminishes the walk speed, placing the player move backwards.
What a worst target! This boomerang shot goes far, far away!
Mathayus meets the bosses: double big trouble for our hero!
Attack this armored enemy by backwards is the unique mode to eliminate him. Forward attacks don't have any effect...
Warriors don't swim? Very weird!
Cybernetic skeletons in Middle Age? No, that's only the appearances...
Protecting itself from a dangerous spike wall.
This gigantic beetle is other boss: attack it without mercy!
Continue screen.
This girl tries avoid that you go forward using a rolling attack, but will be necessary more than this...
An arrow direct in the head? Ugh... :-()
Fire scythes can be fatal when used wisely by a warrior.
It's raining in the desert and the wind is blowing to the contrary direction. You still have to jump some obstacles, etc.
Other boss to defeat: this time, it has a watery aspect and is surrounded by 8 balls. Destroy these balls and continue attacking!
You avoid with success this multiple boomerang shot originated by hands of a possible Sheeva's "ancestor"...
